title.narrative: Strengthening the Families’ Psychosocial Accompanying Program, for Promoting a Comprehensive Protection of Children and Adolescents in Colombia

description.narrative: The project aims to strengthen the Colombian Family Welfare Institute’s (ICBF) assistance processes in order to allow the development of skills and competencies in children and adolescents, by adapting the process that guarantees the rights of children and adolescents, and the prevention of rights violations. In doing so, IOM seeks to implement five specific actions: (1) lead the implementation of policies, plans, programs and projects related to the family and community within the ICBF; (2) define the guidelines for the national and regional level to carry out the detection of needs associated with the family and community in the programs of the Institute within the framework of the current norms and policies; (3) design the family and community care referents in coordination and articulation with the National Family Welfare System and all the referents that are required; (4) define the guidelines and general policies within the implementation of family and community programs and projects; and (5) define the guidelines and schemes of operation of services in the management of resources and advances in the results for family and community care.

participating-org.narrative: Colombia - The Colombian Family Welfare Institute (ICBF)

mailing-address.narrative: Edificio Chicó 94 Carrera 14 No. 93B-46, Floors 1-7, Bogota, Colombia

sector.narrative: Movement, Emergency and Post-Crisis Migration Management
Multisector aid for basic social services

policy-marker.narrative: Project with some but insufficient inclusion of gender issues
